## Internal Audit and Evaluation Consultant Services
### Request for Proposal
*   Solicitation Number: AUDIT2022
*   Closing Date and Time: January 31st, 2023, 2:00 PM EST
*   Category: Service Contract
*   Region: Canada
*   Language: English and French
*   Services Required:
    *   Internal audit and evaluation services for Defence Construction Canada (DCC)
    *   Consultation will be required to assess security requirements
*   Evaluation Criteria:
    *   Firm's ability to provide professional internal audit and evaluation services
    *   Firm's experience and reputation in providing such services
    *   Firm's understanding of DCC's security requirements
*   SOA Duration: Five (5) years
*   Maximum Estimated Value: $400,000.00
*   Call-ups: Estimated value between $10,000.00 and $50,000.00

### Contact Information
*   Name: Camille Attia
*   Title: Contracting Officer
*   Email: [Camille.attia@dcc-cdc.gc.ca](mailto:Camille.attia@dcc-cdc.gc.ca)
*   Phone: 613-715-0564
*   Address: Defence Construction Canada, Constitution Square, 19th Floor, 350 Albert Street, Ottawa, Ontario, K1A 0K3, Canada

### Solicitation Documents
*   Request for Proposal (RFP) documents are available on the MERX Electronic Bidding System.
*   Proponents must submit their proposal electronically through the MERX system.
*   Bidders can obtain contract award results from the DCC website at Contract Activity - Defence Construction Canada.
